section.name: Recording
section.definition: During a recording session in a Setup Datasets are obtained from Cells and/or a Subject by using various stimuli (Stimulus section).

property.name: Experimenter
property.definition: The name of the person actually performing the recordings.

property.name: ExperimenterID
property.definition: If registered in a database the primary key of the person that performed the experiments.

property.name: Start
property.definition: The date and time at which the recording started in (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format).

property.name: End
property.definition: The date and time at which the recording ended in (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format).

property.name: StartDate
property.definition: The date the recording session was conducted (YYYY-MM-DD format).

property.name: EndDate
property.definition: The date the recording session ended (YYYY-MM-DD format).

property.name: StartTime
property.definition: The time the recordings began (hh:mm:ss format).

property.name: EndTime
property.definition: The time the recordings ended (hh:mm:ss format).

property.name: Type
property.definition: The type of recording (EEG, Eyetracker,Motion data).
